pr_title: ST: Add test coverage for improvements for connect and connector operator

timeline.message:
Add test coverage for improvements for connect and connector operator

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

Add s2i status checks

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Are you saying that the NotReady has a NullPointerException as its reason? If so we should fix that.
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: No, it was already fixed and this test just check, that no NPE is in log during this test case.
replies.author: Frawless
